name: LSItemInfoRecord
desc: The specification that contains requested information about an item.

items.name: init(flags: LSItemInfoFlags, filetype: OSType, creator: OSType, extension: Unmanaged<CFString>!)
var `extension`: Unmanaged<CFString>!
items.desc: A Core Foundation string object specifying theitem’s filename extension; see the CFString Reference inthe Core Foundation Reference Documentation for a description ofthe CFStringRef datatype.

items.name: var flags: LSItemInfoFlags
items.desc: Item-information flags specifying informationabout the item; see LSItemInfoFlags for a description of these flags.
